```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)

fia <- read.csv("tree_raw_data_with_env_cleaned.csv") 
ref_species <- read.csv("REF_SPECIES.csv") 
fia <- merge(fia, ref_species, by.x = "spcd", by.y = "SPCD")

fia <- fia %>% select(X, TREEcn, plt_cn, spcd, dia, ht, lat, long, SPECIES, COMMON_NAME) 
```
